user_query: I'm planning a surprise birthday party for my best friend and I need some ideas for the venue and catering. Can you suggest some party venues in New York City with catering services? It would be great if you could also provide me with the traffic information in the city for that day.

TaskList.description: Search for party venues in New York City that offer catering services.
Get traffic information for New York City on the day of the event.
